name: Spring Cleaning (DrawN)
description:
Created for the 2021 Great Spring Game Jam

You're just a watering can that wants to get rid of the goop in the world. That's all.

Controls: 

  • Move - WAS/Up, left, right arrows
  • Interact - Enter/Space/Left Mouse Click

All art and code was made from scratch; music and sound effects are under the Public Domain CC0 license from opengameart.org (may have minor adjustments of speed/pitch/volume using Audacity).

https://opengameart.org/content/bedazzled

https://opengameart.org/content/happy-adventure-loop

https://opengameart.org/content/gui-sound-effects

Apologies in advance if the game seems incomplete; I had a busy schedule these past few days. Hope you enjoy!
